channel.title: Story on Kshitij Chandrakar
channel.description: Recent content in Story on Kshitij Chandrakar

item.title: On Server Hosting
item.description: Cloud So What are we looking for in a web service provider? here’s what I’ll base them on- Design Process - How complex the work is and weather or not it has a UI Designer Integration - How much of a pain is it to set up your own services on it Community - How big and supportive the community is Here are the options . Option Rating (Out of 15) Design Integration Community Remarks Wordpress 15 5 5 5 Pretty Good For begginers, You can Get a site up pretty quickly, Pretty Decent Community, Lots of themes Neocities 9 2 2 5 Personal Favorite, Amazing Community, Great if you want to Configure Stuff Yourself, Not so great when you want to do it quickly, uploading files is finicky.
